description: This medicinal herb garden brings together elders with young people. The design of the garden was made by young people, and includes a mural, a stage for events, a reading area, and a native woodland. The garden participates in a market/cultural festival every Saturday from 12-6 in July and August at Continental Army Plaza where they sell vegetables grown in the garden and demonstrate how to use the medicinal herbs.
name: El Puente Espirito Tierra
